mapper.select: SELECT b.title, b.post, b.writer, b.pid, b.created_at FROM playground.blog b WHERE b.pid = #{pid} AND deleted_at IS NULL
SELECT b.title, b.post, b.writer, b.pid, b.created_at FROM playground.blog b WHERE deleted_at IS NULL LIMIT #{sp}, #{cnt}
SELECT count(*) FROM playground.blog WHERE deleted_at IS NULL
SELECT count(*) FROM playground.blog WHERE pid = #{pid} AND deleted_at IS NULL
